How do you decode the ciphertexts in the "ciphertexts" field using the "onetimePubKey"?

The "onetimePubKey" is not used to decode the ciphertexts. It is actually used to encrypt the ciphertexts. The ciphertexts in the "ciphertexts" field are encrypted using the "onetimePubKey", but the decryption process is not specified in the provided information.
